overview: A doll maker and his daughter Erika live in a remote mountain villa. When some thugs break in and murder Erika and disfigure the old doll maker, he sets about getting his revenge. He creates a life-size doll and has it possessed by Erika's spirit. The doll then tracks down Erika's killers one-by-one...
tagline: A Ghost doll From The Darkside Descends Upon Young Men For Her Sacrifice:Ikenie.
title: Doll from Hell
